title: How are you this evening? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am feeling ecstatic,and off the charts happy this beautiful and glorious spring evening.,For today, I have come to many new conclusions,and the clarity I now have,in my mind, is a indesribeable. And it’s only growing stronger ,and stronger day by day,as time goes by.Its like today,after some serious,percistance and hard work and dedication.I have stumbled over something that I never expected to find.The tinniest and most important pieces of my jigsaw puzzle,the crowning glory piece,the “jewel”,more illusive than a rare red ruby.For if you like,today I found the key,to unluck the secret compartment in the middle of my puzzle,which gave me so much more vision so that i may see much more further ahead,I can littery get instant grattifaction for the things I'm still doing wrong.And I can now in a relatively short time I can stop,adjust and re-allign,and that problem vanishes, right there before my own eyes.Wow what a groundbreaking moment,which I will be forever remembered, for today I got my shadow back which no amount of words I can say will ever come close to explaining how i am now feeling,at this exact precipous moment in my life.
